channel.title: Working Paper on Yixin Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Working Paper on Yixin Liu

item.title: Beyond collaboration: The role of participant diversity in watershed governance
item.description: This paper combines the difference-in-differences design and mediation analysis to examine the impacts of nonprofit watershed councils and the participant diversity on water quality.

item.title: Trust and two-way coproduction: Paired experiments on citizens and policymakers
item.description: This paper conducts a paired of experiments on citizens and municipal policymakers to examine the impacts of trust in government on coproductioin in disaster resilience planning.

item.title: The “watershed” of collaboration: The impact of legislation and collaborative actions on environmental outcomes
item.description: This paper combines the regression discontinuity in time (RDiT) design and longitudinal analysis to examine the impacts of state legislation and the subsequent collaborative projects on water quality.
